sub_title: Principal IC Layout Engineer at Bruco Integrated Circuits B.V.
summary:
Having years of involvement in variety of Integrated Circuit (IC) Layout Design from 0.6um, 350nm, 180nm; down to 90nm, 65nm, 55nm, 45nm: up to sub-nano’s 28nm, 22nm, 20nm, 14nm FinFET, to 10nm FinFET process nodes. Extensive experience from floor planning - to chip layout - to tapeout works, of the following Design Units: Flash Memory, RF Design, IPN, Power Design, Precision Converters, Automotive, Healthcare, Test Device, Design Enablement, Process migration, Process Integration, and Foundry transfer.
 
Customer focused performer who is committed to quality in every task from personal interaction with coworkers and users to high level of service provided to company and customer both from local and foreign countries. 

Valued contributor who performs confidently and effectively under pressure and thrives on challenge.

authors.headline: Principal IC Layout Engineer at Bruco Integrated Circuits B.V.
Staff R&D Engineer at Nordic Semiconductor ASA

profile_positions.description:
My responsibilities include but are not limited to: 
•	Layout Full Custom Chip, RF, Automotive, Analogue, Mixed Signal, IP level and block level layout design. 
•	Layout design of Analog, Mixed Signal and RF design. 
•	Layout design using different technologies from Analog technologies to RF technologies. 
•	Layout design using different layout and verification tools. (Custom Design, Virtuoso L and XL; Calibre LVS, DRC, MRC, Antenna, DFM, Smart tile, ERC; PVS tools; abstract generator; and parasitic extraction) 
•	Layout Consultant to other layout designers and schematic designers.

Accomplished jobs: 
•	Accomplished Full Chip design layout from 0 level to Top. 
•	Completed Full RF switches, mixed signal and Analog Chip. 
•	Tape-out and sign-off. 
•	Final Reviewing, Mentoring and Supervising layout designs of other layout designer.
•	Layout Consultant to other layout designers and schematic designers.
profile_positions.title: Principal IC Layout Engineer

profile_positions.description:
•	Layout design of Analog and RF design.
•	Layout design using different technologies from large technologies to sub nano highspeed RF technologies.
•	Layout design using different layout and verification tools. ( Virtuoso L and XL; Calibre LVS, DRC, MRC, Antenna, DFM, Smart tile, QPE and ERC; PVS tools; abstract generator; and parasitic extraction)
•	Accomplished ESD Test chip, Chip level Mixed Signal Layout, IP level and block level layout.
•	Done block level of various technologies from 180 nm, 130 nm, 65nm, 40nm, upto 28nm.
profile_positions.title: RF / Analog Layout Design Engineer

profile_positions.description:
•	Layout Full Custom Chip, toplevel blocks, blocks and standard cells; of  RF, IPN, Power, Precision Converters and Decoders
•	Layout Full Chip with Multiple Generics.
•	Layout  design of Ultra Low power design, sigma-delta ADC, DAC, VCO, LDO, Switch Mux, Oscillator, Modulator, clock generator, fuse  and LDO.
•	Migration/transfer/porting of layout between foundries ( Local ADI tech, TSMC, Globalfoundries) and processes (0.6um, .35um, .18um)
•	Layout tools: VirtuosoXL (5.1 and 6.1) and Calibredrv
•	Verification tools: Calibre, Hercules and Dracula (DRC, LVS, ERC, Antenna, XOR,ESD and Latchup Verification, Parasitic extraction)
•	Bonding Diagram: Bondi, DraftSight
•	Tapeout (Web base System, Automatic System, Shuttle)
•	Communicate with design engineers, layout engineers and layout enhancement engineers from different sites with different time zones
•	Designate Layout Task
•	Mentor layout engineers
•	Layout and Design Review and Technical Presentation
•	Project Planner (Schedule, number of People for the Project and Layout Task for the whole Chip Project, Contact Persons)
•	Project Lead Layout
profile_positions.title: Senior IC Layout Design Engineer

profile_positions.location: 60 Woodlands Industrial Park D Street 2, Singapore 738406
profile_positions.description:
•	Test Device Design Layout (transistors, resistors, capacitors, efuse, sram cells, fet cores, ESD transistors) for Functional Testing, Process Integration, Process Development or Yield enhancement.
•	Test Macro Design Layout (Ring Oscillators, Seal Rings,Via chains, BEOL,FEOL , SRAM, SEMBAR, ESD devices, and also, Resistors,  Capacitors Diodes and Transistors devices) for Functional Testing, Process Integration, Process Development and Yield enhancement.
•	Expert in Process Technology nodes: 130nm, 65nm, 55nm, 45nm, 32nm, 28nm, 22nm, 20nm, 14nm FinFET, 10nm FinFET
•	Experienced in Building and Developing P-Cell (parameterized cell) for Devices, standard cells and Test Macros; using SKILL programming, Cadence Graphical User Interface P-cell and Cadence Componenent Description Format.
•	Expert in Layout Design Tools: Calibredrv, VIRTUOSO XL and LE, Laker and Custom Designer
•	Verification tools: CALIBRE and Hercules (DRC, LVS and DRV).
•	Technology Environment Manipulation
•	Project Lead Layout
profile_positions.title: Engineering Design Enablement

profile_positions.location: Penthouse 3 Richville Tower, Zapote Alabang Road, Muntinlupa, Philippines
profile_positions.description:
•	VLSI Design using Layout tool: Virtuoso, Laker and Custom Design
•	Layout Design on 28nm process node
•	Design Automation
•	Infrastructure
•	Back end and Front End CAD
•	Support on Web Design and Development
profile_positions.title: Design Automation/Physical Design Engineer

profile_positions.location: Luisita Industrial Park SEPZ, San Miguel, Tarlac, Philippines
profile_positions.description:
•	Flash Memory Layout, Digital and Mixed Analog layout design.
•	Physical Design (blocks, standard cell, IP, chip, floor plan, Pitch blocks, memory cells, decoders, Mixed Analog Signal, Compaction, Layout Arrangement, Placement and Route Design
•	Layout device IP’s, blocks, TEG and CHIP using 0.15µm, 0.18µm, 0.25µm, 0.35µm, 0.8µm and 1.6µm technology.
•	Communicate with Japanese Layout and Designer counterparts
•	Lead layout in standard cell and Full CHIP Flash memory layout design.
•	Support Layout on different Groups: Bi-polar layout , Pure CMOS, Audio layout, Video Layout, Display Layout, Special IP, Standard IP, and Special Controllers groups.
•	Create automation and CAD tools using UNIX shell and SKILL language program.
•	Supervise disseminated work.
•	Discuss and presents accomplished work, new ideas and programs for the benefit of the group.
•	Conducts Lecture to New Employees.
•	Learn Japanese Language
profile_positions.title: IC Layout Design Engineer
